revised_title: Haldan Keffer Hartline: A Pioneering Visual Physiologist
tldr: This biographical memoir recounts the life and scientific journey of Haldan Keffer Hartline, a pioneering visual physiologist. Born in Pennsylvania, Hartline was raised in a family with a strong interest in nature and education. He went on to study at Lafayette College and Johns Hopkins University, where he conducted groundbreaking research on visual responses to light. Hartline's work laid the foundation for modern vision research and contributed to our understanding of the human eye and brain.
